meta.title_zh: 退換小問題：買錯、想換別的

dialogue.text: Hi, how can I help you?
dialogue.zh:
嗨, how 可以 我 幫忙 你?
こんにちは, how できます 私 手伝う あなた?

我 bought the wrong item.
私 bought the wrong item.

What did 你 buy?
What did あなた buy?

This sandwich.
This sandwich.

是 it unopened?
私 it unopened?

是的, 我 didn’t open it.
はい, 私 didn’t open it.

你 有 the 發票?
Do あなた have the レシート?

是的, here it 是.
はい, here it 私.

dialogue.text: Would you like a refund or exchange?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like a refund or exchange?
Would あなた like a refund or exchange?

Exchange, 請.
Exchange, お願いします.

What would 你 like instead?
What would あなた like instead?

A salad.
A salad.

dialogue.text: Sure. Please grab one from the fridge.
dialogue.zh:
當然. 請 grab one from the fridge.
もちろん. お願いします grab one from the fridge.

好的.
わかりました.

Take your time.
Take your time.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

是 this one 好的?
私 this one わかりました?

是的, that works.
はい, that works.

dialogue.text: Great. The price is the same.
dialogue.zh:
太好了. The 價格 是 the same.
いいですね. The 値段 私 the same.

Perfect.
Perfect.

我’ll process the exchange now.
私’ll process the exchange now.

好的.
わかりました.

All done. Here’s your 發票.
All done. Here’s your レシート.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

Anything else today?
Anything else today?

不, that’s all.
いいえ, that’s all.

dialogue.text: No problem. Have a good day.
dialogue.zh:
不 problem. 有 a good day.
いいえ problem. Have a good day.

你 too.
あなた too.

謝謝 coming back.
ありがとう for coming back.

謝謝.
ありがとう.
